entries.name: ANY
entries.desc: Let the parser choose the encoding

entries.name: external_encoding
entries.desc: Set the encoding for this parser to encoding

entries.name: handler
entries.desc: The handler on which events will be called

entries.name: new(handler = Handler.new)
entries.desc: Creates a new Psych::Parser instance with handler.  YAML events will be called on handler.  See Psych::Parser for more details.

entries.name: mark # => #click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a Psych::Parser::Mark object that contains line, column, and index information.

entries.name: parse(yaml)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Parse the YAML document contained in yaml.  Events will be called on the handler set on the parser instance.
